Original:
IG:bar_runner_elijah
MANIA 躁鎮

六張梨站的樂利路上可是有很多酒吧林立，但有霓虹燈和鐵網架的可是只有一家。進入後可不會讓霓虹燈這陶醉的元素去掉，內部的各種裝潢表現店主想營造的氣氛，並且看到移動式梯子在吧檯，這可不常見。常常在酒吧看見男性調酒師，而在躁鎮中可是女力擔當的酒吧，而且還是家無酒單酒吧，想喝甚麼風味、甚麼驚喜，調酒師都會完美的呈現出來。

吧吧節特調Shot-泰迪游泳池
曾經在網路上看到小熊軟糖泡伏特加，這次是小熊軟糖泡調酒!以白酒為基底，蘆薈利口酒和接骨木糖漿散發出來的花香調，小熊軟糖在喝完之後吃，香醇酒味泰迪熊誕生啦。

蘭姆酒/葡萄柚
由甘蔗為原料的蘭姆酒，尤其淺色蘭姆，各式各樣的調酒都會看到他的影子，Daiquiri、Mojito、XYZ、Ti Punch等等，搭配水果的熱帶調酒也是好喝。

皮斯可/楊桃
Pisco Sour想當初是在2019年第一次踏進躁鎮時喝到的第一杯。那時Pisco在台灣還沒那麼盛行，看到吧台展示Porton的Pisco，隨即點了一杯以這為基底的調酒。由Judy親調一杯新鮮葡萄Pisco Sour，綿密泡沫以及絕妙口感還想要再回味一次。
調酒師馨慧詳細講了當天有甚麼新鮮水果，聽到了楊桃覺得很特殊，二話不說就點來看看。Carambola Pisco Sour就此誕生，楊桃是種水分很多，適合清涼解暑的水果，甜味適中的跟皮斯可組合新滋味絕，當第一杯非常適合。

店內吧台最上面可是有幾個寶，品牌大使親筆簽名之外還有大摩舊版12年，這是現在有錢也買不到吧。有機會到六張犁就來坐坐吧，無酒單驚喜在這絕對有品質。
EN:
IG: Bar_runner_elijah
Mania

There are many bars on Leli Road at Liu Zhangli Station, but there are only one neon light and railway rack.After entering, it will not remove the intoxicating element of neon lights. Various internal decoration performance shop owners want to create the atmosphere, and seeing the mobile ladder on the bar is not common.I often see male bartenders in the bar, but in the town of mansion, it is a bar that feminine is the bar, and there are no wines in the family. What kind of flavor and surprise wants to drink, the bartender will be perfectly presented.

Bar Bar Jie Special SHOT-Teddy Swimming Pool
I used to see the little bear fell filling Vodka on the Internet. The wine flavor teddy bear was born.

Rim wine/grapefruit
Rim, with sugarcane as the raw material, especially light -colored Rim, all kinds of bartending will see his shadows, Daiquiri, Mojito, XYZ, Ti Punch, etc., tropical bartending with fruits is also delicious.

Pisco/Cafe
Pisco Sour thought it was the first cup that he drank when he entered the town of Rena in 2019.At that time, Pisco was not so popular in Taiwan. When he saw the pisco of Porton's Porton, he ordered a cup of bartending based on this.A cup of fresh grape Pisco Sour intimately, the dense foam and wonderful taste want to reflect again.
The bartender Xinhui talked in detail what fresh fruits were on the same day. I heard that there was a special way to hear that there was a special point.Carambola Pisco Sour was born. Cafe has a lot of water, suitable for fruits that cool down and relieve heat. The sweetness is perfect with Piske, which is very suitable when the first cup is very suitable.

There are a few treasures on the top of the bar in the shop. In addition to the signature of the brand ambassador, there is also the old version of the Damo version. This is now that you can't buy it now.If you have the opportunity to sit in Liu Zhangli, come and sit. The surprise without wine is absolutely quality.
